title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create an SQL query from the above tables for the following:
● To find the details of students who have secured more than 90 marks in math and science.
● To arrange the details of the students according to their marks in descending order.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
